author: lwang046
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of PR #35617
Update the FED/Crate mapping list based on [https://cmshcal.docs.cern.ch/hcos/crateFedMap/](https://cmshcal.docs.cern.ch/hcos/crateFedMap/ )

#### PR validation:
tested under CMSSW_12_0_2_patch1 with `cmsRun DQM/Integration/python/clients/hcal_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py` on recent data inputfile without errors
title: HcalDQM: update hcal FED list for crate 3-FED readout, back port to 12_0
